text.section: The Department of Labor, Licensing, and Regulation may establish a Youth Apprenticeship Program Advisory Board.

The Advisory Board shall, from time to time, review the program and advise the Secretary of Labor, Licensing, and Regulation, the State Superintendent of Schools, and the Secretary of Higher Education about matters regarding the program.
